column4: See the output of ps ax, since there can only be on wm running at a time like: ps ax|egrep "metacity|compiz|kwin|xfwm"
I see that U'm using compiz as wm. Is there a way to use it to open for example: firefox in desktop number 3 ?
ALL: I see that U'm using compiz as wm. Is there a way to use it in a script to open for example: firefox in desktop number 3 ?
You can use Place Windows in ccsm to have firefox start on any vp and I think you might be able to do it with wmctrl
